text: قل كم لبثتم فى الارض عدد سنين

translations.translation: He will say, 'How many years did you tarry on the earth?'
They will be asked: "How long did you live on the earth in terms of years?"
Then Allah will ask them: "For how many years did you stay on earth?"
God will ask them, "How many years did you live in your graves?"
He will say, “How long did you stay on earth, counting by the number of years?
He will say: "What number of years did you stay on earth"
He will say: How many years did you tarry in the earth?
He shall say, 'How long have you tarried in the earth, by number of years?'
He will say: How long tarried ye in the earth, counting by years?
He will ask, "How many years did you stay on earth?"
He will say: how long tarried ye on the earth in number of year?
He will say, ‘How many years did you remain on earth?’
He will say: "What number of years did ye stay on earth?"
He (Allah) will say: "What number of years did you stay on earth?"
And He will ask: 'How many years did you live on earth'
He will say, “How many years did you remain on earth?”
[Allah] will say, "How long did you remain on earth in number of years?"

[23:112] He, exalted be He, will say, to them by the tongue of a Keeper [of Hell] (a variant reading [for qāla, ‘He will say’] has qul, ‘say’): ‘How long did you tarry in the earth, in this world and in your graves, in years?’ (‘adada sinīna is a specification).
(He will say) Allah will say to them: (How long tarried you) how long have you remained (in the earth) in your graves, (counting by years) how many days and months?

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
صاغرين مهانين فيها { قَالَ } قائلُ من قِبَل الحق على سبيل التوبيخ والتقريع إظهاراً لقبح استبدالهم
 واختيارهم الأدنى بدل الأعلى: { كَمْ لَبِثْتُمْ } أيها الضالون المسرفون { فِي ٱلأَرْضِ } التي كنت تستكبرون عليها خيلاءَ مغرورين { عَدَدَ سِنِينَ } [المؤمنين: 112] أي: كم مدةً وسنةً استقررتم عليها متفوهين؟!

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ قال كم لبثتم } 
 القائل هو الله تعالى
 أو الملك
 وقرأ المكي وحمزة: " قل " التي بلفظ الأمر للملك
 يسألهم: كم لبثوا
 { في الأرض } التي دعوا الله أن يردهم إليها
 { عدد سنين } 
 وهو تمييز
 أي: كم لبثتم في الأرض عدد السنين
